actions.text: On agreeing to the Calvert amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Calvert to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Calvert to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Calvert amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment increases from 10 to 25 the number of allowable localities eligible to conduct environmental reviews and make approvals for projects under State environmental laws and regulations instead of under Federal laws and regulations.
purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to increase the limit on 10 local governments with whom the State can exercise its authority to eliminate duplicative reviews to 25.
